com.nutiteq.editable.layers.deprecated

Class EditableGeometryDbLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.layers.Layer
      • com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.VectorLayer<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>
        • com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.GeometryLayer
          • com.nutiteq.editable.layers.deprecated.EditableGeometryDbLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditableCartoDbVectorLayer, EditableOgrVectorLayer, EditableSpatialiteLayer
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class EditableGeometryDbLayer
extends com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.GeometryLayer
    Vector Layer with extra functions for editing elements Supports all kind of Geometries: Markers, Points, Lines and Polygons
    Author:
    mtehver
